summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2596, for the improvement of 5th Avenue West from West Smith Street to West Ray Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers and side sewers, with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 30278 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
